Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.Versioning.ObsoletedOSPlatform("android31.0", "This class is obsoleted in this android platform")]
[<System.Runtime.Versioning.ObsoletedOSPlatform("android31.0", "This class is obsoleted in this android platform")>]

Docs.summary: This class provides access to a RenderScript context, which controls RenderScript initialization, resource management, and teardown.

remarks.para:
This class provides access to a RenderScript context, which controls RenderScript initialization, resource management, and teardown. An instance of the RenderScript class must be created before any other RS objects can be created.

Developer Guides
For more information about creating an application that uses RenderScript, read the RenderScript developer guide.
This member is deprecated. Renderscript has been deprecated in API level 31. Please refer to the migration guide for the proposed alternatives.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Sub Destroy ()
public: virtual void Destroy();
public virtual void Destroy ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Destroy() cil managed
abstract member Destroy : unit -> unit override this.Destroy : unit -> unit

remarks.para: Destroys this RenderScript context. Once this function is called, using this context or any objects belonging to this context is illegal.
API 23+, this function is a NOP if the context was created with create(). Please use releaseAllContexts() to clean up contexts created with the create function.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Sub ReleaseAllContexts ()
public: static void ReleaseAllContexts();
public static void ReleaseAllContexts ();
.method public static hidebysig void ReleaseAllContexts() cil managed
static member ReleaseAllContexts : unit -> unit

remarks.para: Releases all the process contexts. This is the same as calling .destroy() on each unique context retreived with create(...). If no contexts have been created this function does nothing.
Typically you call this when your application is losing focus and will not be using a context for some time.
This has no effect on a context created with createMultiContext()
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
